CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films show hole mobility of 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an electron mobility of 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT - This is the first material name entity mentioned in the paragraph.
2. PC71BM - This is the second material name entity mentioned in the paragraph.

These entities are the names of the blend films being discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

These are the two material name entities in the paragraph that are relevant to the context. The other terms mentioned in the paragraph are related to the properties of the materials, not the names of the materials themselves.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films show hole mobility of 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an electron mobility of 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 .

Let's think step by step.

1. "hole mobility" is a Property Name
2. "1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" is a Value, specifically a Magnitude associated with the property "hole mobility"
3. "electron mobility" is a Property Name
4. "2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" is a Value, specifically a Magnitude associated with the property "electron mobility"

Therefore, the Property Names in the paragraph are "hole mobility" and "electron mobility".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "hole mobility" is a Material Property
2. "2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" is a Magnitude associated with the Material Property "electron mobility"

Therefore, the relevant Material Property entities in the paragraph are "hole mobility" and "electron mobility".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobility |
| electron mobility |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films show hole mobility of 1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an electron mobility of 2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 .

Let's think step by step.

1. The first property value in the paragraph is "1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1", which is the hole mobility of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.
2. The second property value is "2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1", which is the electron mobility of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.

Both of these values are measures of the mobility of charge carriers (holes and electrons) in the blend films, and are given in the units of square centimeters per volt-second.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "1.14 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" (hole mobility)
2. "2.7 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" (electron mobility)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the values of material properties. The term "PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films" is a description of the material being studied, but it is not a property value itself.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
